text: @proMAGAitalians @cinqenfant11 @IngrahamAngle @kelliwardaz I've been on this rampage for months @sistervpaul_ everyone dying of #COVID19 die from comorbidies and for everyone else, antibodies are great aren't they? They might actually lead to a cure. But @dougducey don't trainwreck a whole economy over this.
